title: Executive Order 5537-Potash Restoration No. 9, California
content: So much of the order of February 21, 1913, creating Potash Reserve No. 2, California No. 1, as affects the lands hereinafter described is hereby revoked:
T. 25 S., R. 43 E., sec. 31, lots 4 and 9.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5537-Potash Restoration No. 9, California Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361174
